page.title: 07AN AFTERNOON IN JASON's life
page.content: At dinner time I play football and cricket butsometimes we play tig.When we get back in class we will be allowed to do our work for another hour.I did some writing and drawing about the civil war until home time at 15.20. After school I go home with Frank. At 19.30 we left from Franks to Huntingdon swimming club. When we see what we've got to do then we dive into the pool and do all these things until 21.00when we get out and get changed. When I come out if I've got enough money I normally buy a drink and then I wait to be collected. When I get home I have a wash then I get undressed and go to bed.I normally have a cup of coffee and after I've drunk it I go to sleep.
